cyclone.name: ELSA
cyclone.trajectory: tracking west-northwest across the eastern Caribbean Sea toward the southern coast of Hispaniola, then Jamaica/Cuba and eventually the southeast Gulf of Mexico
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: southern coast of Hispaniola (near the Haiti–Dominican Republic border)

weather_observation.watch_coast: None in effect for Puerto Rico as of advisory time
weather_observation.warning_coast: None in effect for Puerto Rico as of advisory time
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Windward Islands, southern Leeward Islands, southern coast of Hispaniola, Jamaica, eastern Cuba, and waters south of Puerto Rico
weather_observation.wind: Low chance (≤4%) of sustained tropical-storm-force winds; occasional gusts possible late Friday into early Saturday
weather_observation.rainfall: 1–3 inches widespread with isolated pockets up to 5 inches; risk of flash flooding and minor river rises
weather_observation.other_hazards: Isolated mudslides in mountainous terrain due to heavy rain
